0.text: Innate: Morgana  heals herself for 18% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by her abilities against  champions, large  minions, and medium and large  monsters.
0.html: Innate: Morgana heals herself for 18% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by her abilities against champions, large minions, and medium and large monsters.
markedPassages: heals
champions
minions
monsters

0.text: Active: Morgana throws a sphere of dark magic in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hits and  roots them for a duration.
0.html: Active: Morgana throws a sphere of dark magic in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hits and roots them for a duration.
markedPassages: roots

0.text: Passive: Tormented Shadow's current cooldown is  reduced by 5% of the maximum whenever  Soul Siphon triggers. Simultaneous triggers from multiple targets will stack the cooldown reduction.
0.html: Passive: Tormented Shadow's current cooldown is  reduced by 5% of the maximum whenever Soul Siphon triggers. Simultaneous triggers from multiple targets will stack the cooldown reduction.
markedPassages: reduced
Soul Siphon

1.text: Active: Morgana desecrates the target area for 5 seconds, which deals magic damage instantly as well as every 0.5 seconds to enemies within, increased by 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health). Tormented Soil deals 155% damage against non-epic  monsters.
1.html: Active: Morgana desecrates the target area for 5 seconds, which deals magic damage instantly as well as every 0.5 seconds to enemies within, increased by 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health). Tormented Soil deals 155% damage against non-epic monsters.
markedPassages: 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health)
monsters

0.text: Active: Morgana  shields the target allied  champion or herself for 5 seconds, which absorbs magic damage and grants  crowd control immunity while the shield holds.
0.html: Active: Morgana shields the target allied champion or herself for 5 seconds, which absorbs magic damage and grants crowd control immunity while the shield holds.
markedPassages: shields
champion
crowd control immunity

0.text: Active: Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions over the cast time, dealing magic damage and forming a  tether between herself and each target for 3 seconds, during which the targets are  revealed and  slowed by 20%.
0.html: Active: Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions over the cast time, dealing magic damage and forming a tether between herself and each target for 3 seconds, during which the targets are revealed and slowed by 20%.
markedPassages: tether
revealed
slowed

1.text: Morgana gains  bonus movement speed when moving towards enemies tethered to her.
1.html: Morgana gains  bonus movement speed when moving towards enemies tethered to her.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

2.text: If a target maintains the tether after its duration, they are dealt the same magic damage again, becoming  revealed and  stunned for 1.5 seconds.
2.html: If a target maintains the tether after its duration, they are dealt the same magic damage again, becoming revealed and stunned for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: revealed
stunned

3.text: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be tethered by this ability.
3.html: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be visible to be tethered by this ability.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be tethered by this ability.
